sense.gloss: to do, to undertake, to perform, to play (a game), to study
to send, to dispatch, to despatch
to put, to move, to turn (one's head, glance, etc.)
to give (esp. to someone of equal or lower status), to let have, to present, to bestow, to confer
to run (a business), to keep, to be engaged in, to practice (law, medicine, etc.), to practise
to have (food, drink, etc.), to eat, to drink, to smoke
to hold (a performance), to perform, to show
to harm, to injure, to kill
to have sex, to fuck, to bang
to live, to get by, to get along
to do ... broadly, to do ... to a great distance
to do ... for (someone of equal or lower status), to do ... to

sdata.j: ↑俺↑↓おれ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑射殺↑↓しゃさつ↓して|やる|。
↑考↑↓かんが↓えていることを↑聞↑↓き↓くな。|やる|ことを↑聞↑↓き↓け。
sdata.e: Don't ask what they think. Ask what they do.

sdata.j: |やる|↑気↑↓き↓があれば↑方法↑↓ほうほう↓は↑見↑↓み↓つかるもの。
sdata.e: Where there's a will, there's a way.

sdata.j: |やる|べきことがたくさんあります。↑手伝↑↓てつだ↓ってほしいですか。
sdata.e: There's quite a lot of things to do; do you want some help?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑役割↑↓やくわり↓を↑果↑↓は↓たせ、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓はその↑他↑↓た↓の↑事↑↓こと↓を|やる|。
sdata.e: You do your part and I'll do the rest.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はそれをもっと↑早↑↓はや↓く|やる|べきだったのに。↑今↑↓いま↓となってはどうしようもない。
sdata.e: You should have done it earlier. It cannot be helped now.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は、↑今↑↓いま↓それを|やる|↑方↑↓ほう↓が↑良↑↓よ↓い。
sdata.e: It is better for you to do it now.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑成功↑↓せいこう↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑一生懸命↑↓いっしょうけんめい↓|やる|かどうかにかかっている。
sdata.e: Your success depends upon whether you work hard or not.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はその↑仕事↑↓しごと↓を|やる|↑能力↑↓のうりょく↓がある。
sdata.e: He is equal to the task.
